phrases: To awaken us, the young mankind,
and fight to protect their loved ones
Will set out on their journey as the war rages on.
Slicing through the darkness they fly toward
that blue planet that shines in the distance
The doctor said your wounds are not serious.
he wants to keep you in the hospital until we get more detailed results back.
it is not uncommon for people to feel fine at first but suddenly drop dead.
It is just for four or five days.
Well, I will see you in four hours.
It is my fault that you were hurt.
Do I have something on my face?
You have never said, I am sorry to me before, Captain.
Anyway, it is clear that my orders are to blame for what happened.
If I were a better pilot, then I would not get hurt no matter what orders you gave.
It is not your fault, Captain.
I feel like I have lost my confidence.
This is not like you at all.
I cannot leave the bridge unattended, so I will be going now.
So you do know the word thanks.
The boy's injuries were not serious, right?
The same thing happened to me once, you know.
The first time I met Focker, my heart kind of went twang...
Even at work, my head was full of him.
And no matter what I did, I just could not focus.
Do not make it sound like I am a robot or something!
That is not what I meant.
Did you tell the boy how you feel?
Do not worry that he is younger than you.
Just come out and say it!
It is not like that at all.
With as many people as we have on board, supplies can be a problem.
How long will we be staying here, sir?
Until we have finished taking on supplies.
Oh, and I gave Captain Hayase a stern lecture
about not letting her personal feelings interfere with her work.
Considering what I saw when I came in, it might have been a little too stern.
With him after school, on my way home
And she is getting farther and farther away...
No matter what I try, she...
At the corner of that same old intersection
He made sure no one else was around
You have even got Minmay singing to you in here!
You came to pay me a visit, right?
C'mon, do not look at me all scary like that!
I am just glad you were not hurt too badly.
Now take your mind off of things and just get some rest.
That is the last thing I feel like doing.
You have got to get it together, Leader.
I mean, getting hurt in an attack like that is just...
It is all over for me when my own men talk to me like that.
After all, we are gunnin' to become leaders ourselves!
You will be in here forever if these two stay.
I have seen you are alive, so I guess I can relax now.
Like she would ever show up.
She is a big star now.
She does not have the time.
Then they must be from Capt.
He seemed worse off mentally than physically.
There is only one specific medicine that will cheer him up at this point.
So, is this business or pleasure?
If I had to say, it is a bit of both.
I checked out Minmay's schedule, and today she is on the set filming her first movie.
Sorry to ask you to run errands for me like this.
Now then, can I tell you what I want in return?
I have just learned how to make a pineapple salad.
Would you like to try it?
I will drop by once I am off duty.
I am after a busy lady.
If she goes someplace else, I will not be able to find her.
Get your brand-new Minmay dolls right here!
Buy one now before they are sold out!
Leaving a long trail of vapor
I have got to have one.
My stock's all over the place!
That disco's nice, but it is always the same guys there.
And they are all posers, anyway.
The guys there are all idiots.
The old man did not even notice.
And now for the spoils of war!
That is a Minmay doll you are hiding, is not it?
You took that from some child, did not you?
You are into high school girls?!
I am going to poke you!
I have not seen you guys around here before.
We, uh, well, we work over there.
That is the disco we always go to!
We were on our way there ourselves.
Perfect, it is three on three.
Speaking to women without permission is a court-martial offense!
What gives you the right to lecture me?!
I am just saying you should feel ashamed to be a warrior.
You came strolling up to the front line after we had already done all the work!
The only reason you can mouth off now
is because we were there to haul you out of the ocean.
You seem to enjoy bragging about how you have never been defeated,
the Macross has an ace pilot of its own!
An ace pilot on the Macross?
We are making a kung fu movie!
You came to cheer me on, right?
Actually, I came here about Hikaru, and to ask a favor.
He is in the hospital right now.
I was wondering if you could stop by and see him.
It is not serious, but he is really down in the dumps.
I figured seeing your face might cheer him up.
Oh, so that is why you...
I know you are busy, but if you could just pop in for a second.
I do not know how long I can stay, though.
I will go talk to my manager!
Soldiers fight because they like it, so when they get hurt, they brought it on themselves.
We are starting the test for scene 12!
I hope this will cheer him up a little.
A single enemy ship is closing in at high speed.
Captain Global has ordered a scramble.
Oh, hey, do not tell Hikaru about this.
Knowing him, he might push his luck and try to launch too.
And tell Kakizaki and Max to stick with my team.
Captain, are you sure we should not lift off?
We have not finished loading the supplies yet.
We will just see how things go for the time being.
But do not let them get near the Macross!
Once the enemy I indicate has appeared,
you are not to engage him under any circumstances.
Just make sure that he and l can face off, one-on-one.
Windsor Squadron, get ready to launch next!
You are getting back to normal.
Your engines are up and running.
This is Skull Leader, ready to launch!
Major, try to keep the enemy away from the Macross.
I am looking forward to some pineapple salad!
What is pineapple salad code for?
Where did you run off to?
Your boss is not here, so you would better stay sharp!
All right, which one of these is their ace pilot?
That is just what I was thinking.
Do not you think they should be sending craft toward the Macross?
I do not want them to, but you are exactly right.
It is as if they are only targeting Vermilion Three.
Tell Lt. Max to clear out.
If their command ship moves to pursue then you may well be right.
But based on our observations, that is what we think.
We will find out soon enough.
It looks like the enemy's after you.
You are looking better than I would imagined.
This is not a bad room at all.
Sorry, but I slipped out in-between setups so I could not buy you anything.
Oh, do not worry about that.
Anyway, how did you know I was in the hospital?
Can I sit down for a minute?
It would not be so hard if it were just the movie,
but there are press interviews, and I am called out to all sorts of parties.
I feel like there is not enough of me to go around.
Say, is Kaifun in your kung fu movie too?
Kaifun's an expert at Chinese martial arts, right?
That is why the director took a liking to him...
It is headed right for us!
Seal all entrances into the Macross!
An enemy unit has entered the ship!
Anyone outside, please take shelter in the nearest building!
But let me tell you something: the Macross has an ace pilot of its own!
The enemy has lost interest in fighting.
Someday I will redeem myself of this disgrace.
He almost took out their command unit.
You did not come back on time, and now the whole shoot's off schedule!
Did you see a man in here?
What if some weird rumors got started about you sleeping in here?
He got shot up bad this time!
This thing is really messed up.
He is got a real ace on his team.
The pineapple salad will be ready in a minute.
Why do not you have a drink while you are waiting?
Captain Global is contacted by a government willing to take in the refugees,
and orders the Macross to set a course for North America.
But when the Macross comes under attack by Kamujin just prior to reaching its destination,
it responds by setting the Omni-Directional Barrier to full power.
I will not follow it anymore
The shadow you cast as you run away
We all keep running until the end
But we still cannot see the goal
Even now, I keep running toward
The light that shines so far away
